name: Snake (itch) (Daffa Abiyyu)
description:
Remember the classic Snake game in your phone back in early 21st century? Yes. This is a game based on that.

Presenting 'Snake', an arcade game that took a different take on the cult-classic snake. Now, Snake must avoid bullets aimed at it. Besides bullet, there's laser that can fry it, fog that can make it distracted, and more!

This game is created as a final project for my first year of campus life (2016). For those interested in the original source code, it can be acquired publicly at GitHub.
